item.title: Posh-SSH: Open Source SSH PowerShell Module
item.description: What Posh-SSH is a PowerShell 3.0 or newer module for automating tasks against system using the SSH protocol. The module supports only a subset of the capabilities that the different SSH RFCs http://en.
